meanings.definition: Not strict or severe in discipline or control.
meanings.sent1: The teacher was the laxest when it came to homework deadlines.
meanings.sent2: The laxest rule in the house was no shoes on the carpet.
meanings.sent3: The laxest guard at the museum fell asleep on duty.
meanings.sent4: His laxest attitude towards safety led to a preventable accident.
meanings.sent5: The laxest security measures allowed the thief to easily enter the building.

meanings.sent1: The rope was the laxest at the end, making it hard to tie securely.
meanings.sent2: Her hair tie became laxest after a long day of running around.
meanings.sent3: The laxest elastic band snapped right when he needed it.
meanings.sent4: The laxest grip on the steering wheel made her car swerve unexpectedly.
meanings.sent5: The laxest knot in the net caused the fish to escape.
